casebody.data:
No. 11-5038. Edwin Hart Turner, Petitioner v. Christopher B. Epps, Commissioner, Mississippi Department of Corrections. 565 U.S. 1115, 132 S. Ct. 998,

181 L. Ed. 2d 742,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 388. January 9, 2012.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 412 Fed. Appx. 696.
